ingredients.ingredient: 2 (9 inch) frozen pie crusts, thawed and ready to bake

cookingTips: Cook the sausage completely and cool before assembling to prevent soggy crust
Roll the pie crust gently to avoid cracking
Brush with egg wash before baking for a golden, glossy finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create easy appetizers by cooking sausage thoroughly, cooling it, and rolling it in pastry with mustard for bite-sized portions.
